issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
When using {{SCLAlertView}} the following error is thrown during the Hyperloop metabase creation: {{Couldn't find block with signature: BOOL (^)(void) for framework: SCLAlertView-Objective-C}}

h4. Steps to reproduce
1. Create a simple app with hyperloop enabled
2. Create a {{Podfile}} at the project root and add {{pod 'SCLAlertView-Objective-C'}}.
3. appc run -p ios

h4. Expected Result
App will build and run successfully

h4. Actual Result
Build errors out with the above message.
fields.summary: Hyperloop iOS: Missing block for SCLAlertView
